body:
Whenever i use /report my game crashes and times me out. Is this just me or is this happening to everyone?

MLGPorky: Also, for those of you who are curious, the /report command does crash your game, but the report still goes through. However, it would be best to notify a staff member in-game so that you avoid crashing your game, as Midnight said.


Rileguy: Use /TELL (all caps) and message a mod in your game

title: [Issue] /report problem

replies.body:
It's a known issue. You're not the only one who's going through this, unfortunately. :/

Just message a moderator in game if you have to report someone.
replies.body_tagged:
It's a known issue. You're not the only one who's going through this, unfortunately. :/

Just message a moderator in game if you have to report someone.

replies.body: That is happening to everyone, it will be fixed soon though!
replies.body_tagged: That is happening to everyone, it will be fixed soon though!

replies.body: Ok thanks! This can be locked

replies.body: Just to expand on midnights post you can use the /TELL command. Yes it does have to be in caps in order for the msg to go through.
replies.body_tagged: Just to expand on midnights post you can use the /TELL command. Yes it does have to be in caps in order for the msg to go through.

replies.body:
You're right.
I've notified the Sr. staff so they will lock it once they get on the forums. :)

Also, for those of you who are curious, the /report command does crash your game, but the report still goes through. However, it would be best to notify a staff member in-game so that you avoid crashing your game, as Midnight said.
